body: I agree with Cezbla. Their is a lot of favoritism to premium on this server. I report a premium cause they admitted to hacking. No infraction! Someone admitted to hacking and they were non upgraded. They get a lifetime ban! If you agree with me that you have experienced favortism do +1.

replies.body: We don't need a thread on this to discuss someone's ban as the last 2 were locked for a reason. This should not be continued and furthermore if you have an issue with a staff member and how they punish, talk to a director. It's not favoritism.
